thread.name: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

email.subject: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: is anyone up for some golf this weekend?

email.subject: RE: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: I am in.
What day?
What time?
Where?
Can we get out there early?

email.subject: RE: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: I thought we were all going somewhere on Sunday??? Mark???

email.subject: Re: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: Sunday it is.
Let me know where ya'll want to play.
Treeline is right by my house, but we don't have to go there.
Somewhere in a central location for everyone is fine.
Throw out some names.
Early is good, that way we can watch my fantasy football kick someone's ass.

email.subject: Re: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: Sunday morning is good for me.
As much as me and my colon will miss "Brock Dogs", I wouldn't mind another course.
There is a pretty nice course in Crosby (Newport Country Club) which would be accomodating for the blues man (Richard).
The shorter drive for him ensures that he doesn't get too much ass time which in turn allows me to kick more of it later that day.
Their weekend rate is $25.
They usually have an ad in the Chronicle Sports section.
For once in my life, all of you are looking UP to me!!!!!

email.subject: Re: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: Ernie, can you call and get us a few tee times at the Crosby Country Club.
Sounds like imbreedville to me, but let's give it a try.
"siva66" <siva66@mail.ev1.net 11/07/01 08:27AM
that sounds good to me, everyone else agree?
we also need a head count, and ernie before long you'll take your usual position bringing up the rear.
once again, mark will not answer my e- mails......

email.subject: RE: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: did we get tee times?

email.subject: RE: seeing as mark won't answer my e-mails....

text.sentence: I heard an add on 610 for Kingwood Cove or something.
Do you have time to check it out?
"Martinez, Ernesto Jr" <martier@cpchem.com 11/07/01 02:26PM
No.
They have a tournament on Sunday morning.
Their first available tee time is 1:15.
Damn, and I was hoping Mark would wear his Hillrod wig.
Sorry, any other suggestions?
Please read the message below (from Mark).
He asked about it, I looked it up and got us a tee time.
If anybody wants to get a tee time somewhere else, that is fine with me.
Just let me know so that I can cancel the tee times in Kingwood.
With Richard playing and the boys from Austin playing, I think that Kingwood is a happy medium.
We could try Brock park if that's what you guys want.
Who the hell lives by Brock?
I actually think that the drive to Kingwood is better than the drive into 5th ward or whatever ward it is.
I don't mind making a drive to play in Austin or Beaumont or Katy.
It's golf!!!!
Bitching is what I do, so I will continue to bitch.
Please look us up some sports bar near Texarkana so I can watch some NFL action after I kick your butts at golf.
Long live the Beaver!!! Mark, your driving right...
I think we need to leave at 4 am or so to make it to the border.

email.to: X- martier@cpchem.com, MarkM@cajunusa.com, Wolphguy@aol.com, Frthis@aol.com, Rs1119@aol.com, Quigley, Dutch </O=ENRON/OU=NA/CN=RECIPIENTS/CN=DQUIGLE, john_riches@msn.com, jramirez@othon.com, bwdunlavy@yahoo.com, klyn@pdq.net
email.subject: Re: Why Kingwood?

text.sentence: is bitching what you do or what you are?
it's probably the latter because you always have and always will be my little bitch.
ernie, got a ps2 baby!!!! working on that god damned madden 2002, still trying to win 2 games in a row.
look forward to kicking your ass soon (in golf and madden '02).
kevin make sure you bring your knee pads on sunday.
quigley, bring extra clubs in case you break some more.
mark leave all the clubs at home and just bring that 9 wood you hit off the tee, your norwegian chipper and your putter.
joe just try and hit the damn ball.
richard, i can't talk trash 'cause your daughter is so damn cute (love the picture you sent); oh wait yes i can: i guess she got your wifes looks!
jerry: where art thou????? as for myself i will soon be buying stock in some sort of golf ball manufacturing company seeing as i am putting so much money into those companies with my "golf" game.
kingwood, brock, it's all the same..golf with friends.
quit your bitching, wake up a little earlier, and play with your friends.
kevin, you're still a whore.
